name: Confused (Global Game Jam 2021)
description:
Confused in the official website of the Global Game Jam!

Confused, alone with your thoughts and my game.
Your mind is playing tricks at you...

Arrows keys to move.

Estimated playtime : 10 minutes.

This is a solo project!

PS : Pressing the Escape Key doesn't work in the html5 version. Ha, ha!
